product_name: ICEBUG Attla BUGrip Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The ICEBUG Attla BUGrip(TM) men's waterproof running shoes feature flexible yet heavy-duty traction so you can brave snowy, muddy or icy conditions on your run. BUGrip rubber outsoles feature deep treads and 15 carbide tips that bite into snow, ice or mud; carbide tips recess slightly into soles for a smooth ride on flat surfaces. Desgined for road-running, the Attla BUGrip shoes are also suitable for use on trails. Polyurethane and mesh uppers with waterproof, breathable membranes keep feet dry without letting them overheat; mesh linings wick moisture away. EVA midsoles and polyurethane shanks provide all-day comfort and support. Internal thermoplastic urethane stabilizers enhance lateral stability from heel to midfoot to minimize pronation. Toe bumpers protect toes from rocks and abrasion. ICEBUG Attla BUGrip men's running shoes feature reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The ICEBUG Attla BUGrip(TM) men's waterproof running shoes feature flexible yet heavy-duty traction so you can brave snowy, muddy or icy conditions on your run.
